knimeNode.name: Vector Distance (3-D)
knimeNode.shortDescription: This node calculates the vector distance between two points in 3-D space

intro.p: This node calculates the vector distance between two points in 3-D Euclidean space (i.e [x1-x0, y1-y0, z1-z0]). The coordinates are contained in 6 numerical columns.
This node was developed by Vernalis Research (Cambridge, UK) . For feedback and more information, please contact knime@vernalis.com

fullDescription.option: The x-coordinate of the first point
The y-coordinate of the first point
The z-coordinate of the first point
